attributes.action: concentrate more on the provisions for the elderly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I work in the care sector and more elderly are being neglected as things are not cost effective you should put more money into this than banning smoking and road pricing legislation which is going to cost a lot of money and police resorces to enforce. Our elderly deserve better treatment as if they have the MRSA they dont get the treatment as it costs nhs £60-£700 per injection i think this is disgusting i think you should enforce the lottery to invest the money they waste on millenium domes into nhs

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
